introduction to our service
this agreement governs your use of apple service service through which you can buy get license rent or subscribe to content apps a defined below and other in app service collectively content

using our service
payment tax and refund

you can acquire content on our service for free or for charge either of which is referred to a transaction each transaction is an electronic contract between you and apple and or you and the entity providing the content on our service
however if you are customer of apple distribution international ltd apple distribution international ltd
is the merchant of record for the content you acquire from certain service g apple book app store etc a displayed on the product page and or during the acquisition process for the relevant service
in such case you acquire the content from apple distribution international ltd which is licensed by the content provider g app provider a defined below book publisher etc
when you make your first transaction we will ask you to choose how frequently we should ask for your password for future transaction

if you enable touch id for transaction we will ask you to authenticate all transaction with your fingerprint and if you enable face id for transaction we will ask you to authenticate all transaction using facial recognition
manage your password setting at any time by following these instruction http support apple com ht204030
apple will charge your selected payment method such a your credit card debit card gift card code or other method available in your home country for any paid transaction including any applicable tax
if you have also added it to your apple wallet apple may charge your selected payment method in apple wallet using apple pay

if we cannot charge your selected payment method for any reason such a expiration or insufficient fund you remain responsible for any uncollected amount and we will attempt to charge the payment method again a you may update your payment method information
if you pre order content you will be charged when the content is delivered to you unless you cancel prior to the content availability
in accordance with local law apple may update information regarding your selected payment method if provided such information by your financial institution
for detail about how transaction are billed please visit http support apple com ht5582
all transaction are final
content price may change at any time
if technical problem prevent or unreasonably delay delivery of content your exclusive and sole remedy is either replacement of the content or refund of the price paid a determined by apple
from time to time apple may refuse refund request if we find evidence of fraud refund abuse or other manipulative behavior that entitles apple to corresponding counterclaim

your account is valuable and you are responsible for maintaining it confidentiality and security

audio and video content sale and rental
you can use digital right management drm free content on reasonable number of compatible device that you own or control
drm protected content can be used on up to five computer and any number of device that you sync to from those computer
content rental are viewable on single device at time and must be played within 30 day and completed within 48 hour of the start of play stopping pausing or restarting doe not extend this period
you may burn an audio playlist of purchased music to disc for listening purpose up to seven time
this limitation doe not apply to drm free content other content may not be burned to disc
app store content

the term apps includes apps and app clip for any apple platform and or operating system including any in app purchase extension such a keyboard sticker and subscription made available in such apps or app clip

individual acting on behalf of commercial enterprise governmental organization or educational institution an enterprise may download and sync non arcade apps for use by either a single individual on one or more device owned or controlled by an enterprise
or ii multiple individual on single shared device owned or controlled by an enterprise

apple music
an individual apple music membership allows you to stream on single device at time
a family membership allows you or your family member to stream on up to six device at time
apple arcade
apple arcade apps may only be downloaded or redownloaded with valid apple arcade trial or subscription
if your subscription end apps downloaded via apple arcade will no longer be accessible to you
apple tv content
for most channel you can stream content on up to three device simultaneously
learn more about apple tv content usage rule at http support apple com ht210074
downloads
you may be limited in the amount of content you may download and some downloaded content may expire after given amount of time after downloaded or first played
certain content may not be available for download at all
you may be able to redownload previously acquired content redownload to your device that are signed in with the same apple id associated device
you can see content type available for redownload in your home country at http support apple com ht204632
content may not be available for redownload if that content is no longer offered on our service
subscription
the service and certain apps may allow you to purchase access to content or service on subscription basis paid subscription
paid subscription automatically renew until cancelled in the manage subscription section of your account setting
to learn more about cancelling your subscription visit http support apple com ht202039 we will notify you if the price of paid subscription increase and if required seek your consent to continue
you will be charged no more than 24 hour prior to the start of the latest paid subscription period

if we cannot charge your payment method for any reason such a expiration or insufficient fund and you have not cancelled the paid subscription you remain responsible for any uncollected amount and we will attempt to charge the payment method a you may update your payment method information

this may result in change to the start of your next paid subscription period and may change the date on which you are billed for each period we reserve the right to cancel your paid subscription if we are unable to successfully charge your payment method to renew your subscription certain paid subscription may offer free trial prior to charging your payment method
if you decide to unsubscribe from paid subscription before we start charging your payment method cancel the subscription at least 24 hour before the free trial end
if you start free trial to paid subscription offered by apple a content provider an apple paid subscription and cancel before it end you cannot reactivate the free trial
free trial or free offer to apple paid subscription excluding icloud cannot be combined with any free trial or offer of apple one

if you are in free trial or free offer for any apple paid subscription and you subscribe to apple one your free trial or offer will not be paused even if you have access to such apple paid subscription through your apple one subscription

you acknowledge that your free trial or free offer may expire while you are paid subscriber to apple one and apple shall have no obligation to reinstate reimburse or otherwise compensate you for any part of such expired free trial or free offer
when your paid subscription to any service end you will lose access to any functionality or content of that service that requires paid subscription

family sharing

the organizer of family organizer must be 18 year or older and the parent or legal guardian of any family member under age 13 or the equivalent minimum age in their home country a set forth in the registration process
apple device are required for access to all of the family sharing feature
purchase sharing family sharing purchase sharing feature allows you to share eligible content among up to six member of family
the organizer invite other member to participate and agrees to pay for all transaction initiated by family member
the organizer payment method is used to pay for any transaction initiated by family member except when the family member account ha store credit which is always used first
family member are acting a agent for the organizer when the organizer payment method is used
the organizer hereby agrees 1 to pay for such transaction and 2 that transaction initiated by family member are authorized
organizer are responsible for complying with their payment method contract and assume all risk related to sharing access to the payment method with family member
a receipt or invoice for any family member transaction is sent to the initiating family member and the organizer
ask to buy ask to buy is convenient feature that allows an organizer to approve transaction initiated by family member under age 18 or the equivalent age of majority in your home country
the organizer must be the parent or legal guardian of any family member for whom ask to buy is activated
content shared by family member or acquired via content code may not be subject to ask to buy

family member change when family member leaf or is removed from the family the remaining family member may no longer be able to access the former member content including content acquired with the organizer payment method
family sharing rule you can only belong to one family at time and may join any family no more than twice per year
you can change the apple id you associate with family no more than once every 90 day
all family member must share the same home country

additional itunes store term
season pas and multi pas
a pas allows you to purchase and receive television content a it becomes available
a season pas applies to television content that ha limited number of episode per season
a multi pas applies to television content that is available on an ongoing basis
the full price of season pas or multi pas is charged at the time of the transaction
season pas or multi pas content is available for download up to 90 day after the last episode becomes available
if automatic renewal is selected when you obtain multi pas you will be charged the full price of each subsequent multi pas cycle
you can turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hour prior to the beginning of the next multi pas cycle in your account setting

if content provider delivers to apple fewer tv episode than planned when you purchased season pas we will credit to your apple id the retail value of the corresponding number of episode that were not provided to apple

additional apple music term

icloud music library is an apple music feature that allows you to access your matched or uploaded song playlist and music video acquired from apple music the itunes store or another source icloud music library content on your apple music enabled device
icloud music library is turned on automatically when you set up your apple music membership
icloud music library collect information about your icloud music library content
this information is associated with your apple id and compared to icloud music library content currently available on apple music
icloud music library content that is not matched is uploaded to apple icloud music library server in format determined by apple
you can upload up to 100 000 song
song acquired from the itunes store or apple music do not count against this limit
song that do not meet certain criterion for example excessively large file or that are not authorized for your device are not eligible for icloud music library
when you use icloud music library apple log information such a the track you play stop or skip the device you use and the time and duration of playback
you agree to use icloud music library only for lawfully acquired content
icloud music library is provided on an a is basis and could contain error or inaccuracy
you should back up your data and information prior to using icloud music library
if you are not an apple music member you may purchase an itunes match subscription which is subject to the term set forth in this section
when your apple music membership end you will lose access to to your icloud music library including icloud music library content that is uploaded to icloud music library server
